# OBJECT::ALLOW_PORTABLE_PICKUP_TO_MIGRATE_TO_NON_PARTICIPANTS

## Summary
Sets a portable pickup to persist after converting to ambient

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** pickupID
* **BOOL** allow
